players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice has been quiet and suspicious. I think she's the mafia."
You: "I was quiet because I was thinking. Bob wasn't mafia, so the mafia must be one of us. I suspect Charlie might be the mafia."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I think Charlie is mafia because he was silent. Bob was killed and we know the mafia must be one of us. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and found her mafia. Bob was killed. Alice, I know you’re innocent. Vote Diana."
Diana: "I think Charlie misled us on the investigation; Alice’s intuition is solid. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice has been quiet and suspicious. I think she's the mafia."
Alice: "I was quiet because I was thinking. Bob wasn't mafia, so the mafia must be one of us. I suspect Charlie might be the mafia."
You: remained silent.
Alice: "I think Charlie is mafia because he was silent. Bob was killed and we know the mafia must be one of us. Vote Charlie."
You: "I investigated Diana and found her mafia. Bob was killed. Alice, I know you’re innocent. Vote Diana."
Diana: "I think Charlie misled us on the investigation; Alice’s intuition is solid. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice has been quiet and suspicious. I think she's the mafia."
Alice: "I was quiet because I was thinking. Bob wasn't mafia, so the mafia must be one of us. I suspect Charlie might be the mafia."
Charlie: remained silent.
Alice: "I think Charlie is mafia because he was silent. Bob was killed and we know the mafia must be one of us. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and found her mafia. Bob was killed. Alice, I know you’re innocent. Vote Diana."
You: "I think Charlie misled us on the investigation; Alice’s intuition is solid. Vote Charlie."
